sentences.sContent: And maybe she didn't murder her flatmate. And just maybe these two facts are entirely related.
sentences.sContent_eng: And maybe she didn't murder her flatmate. And just maybe these two facts are entirely related.
sentences.sCn: 也许，诺克斯确曾经在某趟火车上与某个陌生男子发生了性关系，而她的确没有杀害她的室友，那么恰好，这两个事实被完全地相互关联了起来。

words.tran: 平坦的；扁平的；浅的；单调的

trans.tranOther: someone who shares a flat with one or more other people
